create procedure dbo.USR_USP_DATAFORMTEMPLATE_ADD_GIFTAIDMANAGER ( @ID uniqueidentifier = null output, @CHANGEAGENTID uniqueidentifier = null, @USERNAME nvarchar(100) = '', @PASSWORD nvarchar(max) = '' ) as
set nocount on;
if @ID is null set @ID = newid()
if @CHANGEAGENTID is null exec dbo.USP_CHANGEAGENT_GETORCREATECHANGEAGENT @CHANGEAGENTID output
declare @CURRENTDATE datetime set @CURRENTDATE = getdate()
begin try -- handle inserting the data insert into dbo.USR_GIFTAIDMANAGER (ID, USERNAME, PASSWORD, ADDEDBYID, CHANGEDBYID, DATEADDED, DATECHANGED) values (@ID, @USERNAME, @PASSWORD, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CHANGEAGENTID, @CURRENTDATE, @CURRENTDATE)
end try
begin catch exec dbo.USP_RAISE_ERROR return 1 end catch
return 0
